backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, habit creation with categories, completions tracking, and access‑controlled CRUD operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old habit records by assigning a default category and returning an updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report linking features to the frontend files, components, and requirements they fulfill.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up metadata, favicon links, and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI logic handling authentication, habit filtering by category, habit creation, and overall app layout.
frontend/src/components/CreateHabitModal: Modal UI for creating a habit with name, color, and category selection plus error handling.
frontend/src/components/EditDisplayNameM: Modal for editing a user's display name with validation and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/EditHabitModal.t: Modal for editing a habit’s name, color, and category with preset options and form submission handling.
frontend/src/components/HabitCard.tsx: Displays a habit card with editing, deletion, completion toggling, and a two‑week completion grid.
frontend/src/components/HabitHistoryModa: Modal showing six months of calendar‑style habit completion history using generated month/week grids.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSection.t: Profile UI handling login, display name editing, dropdown actions, and sign‑out behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRole.ts: Ensures the authenticated user is assigned the user role by calling the backend once per session.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functions, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, habits, completions, and related updates using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, custom animations, scrollbar styling, focus styles, and transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingErrors.ts: Converts backend error messages into friendly, user-readable strings with basic categorization.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths and extending the theme with custom fonts.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining features, requirements, and current state for the habit categories update.
